content:
Hi folks! Now that 5.0 is out, we can start test-deploying features again. I've been working on the release for so long, that I think I'm forgetting some ideas we had lined up. The one that comes to mind is:

  • Add more format buttons #20672

Are there other PRs folks are aware of where the next step is to test-deploy on CZO?
We also pulled off new Collapsible private messages section, maybe we can test-deploy it again ?
Yeah, I was thinking about that one. Is there something we need to figure out with more CZO testing for that, or is the next step to get the code into a mergeable state?
I think the next step is get the code into a mergeable state only.
as it's already been approved by design discussions so far, and we've already merged a preparatory commit for that PR, and the second one also is waiting for code review -- #21357

but still i would prefer it been test-deployed here as it may help us out if we keep playing with such major change on a large platform like CZO and figure out any possible edge cases (if we missed out to handle them)

Another one that I think is coming up is compose_box: Add button to go the narrow message is being composed to.
#19590, if it's ready enough from a code perspective.
We also have this - #21374 -- unread count pills background color in dark-theme.

custom_profile_fields: Allow display in user profile popover. #21588.

Discussion

Yogesh Sirsat said:

custom_profile_fields: Allow display in user profile popover. #21588.

Discussion

Looks like the next step on this one is for me to review the PR.

compose: Disable unneeded buttons while in preview. #20993(I think we didn't test-deployed it after new changes)

And its PR is reviewed by you and Aman Agrawal (amanagr)
